species.name: Human
species.description: The most common species in the galaxy, humans are adaptable and varied.
traits: Adaptable: Can excel in any role
Varied: No specific bonuses or penalties

species.name: Engineer
species.description: A mysterious alien species with an innate understanding of technology.
traits: Tech-savvy: +1 to all rolls involving technology
Analytical: +1 to Problem Solving rolls

species.name: Feral
species.description: Genetically engineered humanoids with animal-like features and instincts.
traits: Enhanced Senses: +1 to detection rolls
Primal Instincts: +1 to Initiative rolls

species.name: K'Erin
species.description: A warrior species known for their honor and combat prowess.
traits: Warrior Culture: +1 to Combat Skill
Honor-bound: Cannot flee from combat

species.name: Precursor
species.description: An ancient, highly advanced species with psionic abilities.
traits: Psionic: Can use psionic powers
Ancient Wisdom: +1 to Savvy

species.name: Soulless
species.description: Robotic entities with a collective consciousness.
traits: Robotic: Immune to fear and mind-affecting abilities
Collective Intelligence: Can share information instantaneously with other Soulless

species.name: Swift
species.description: Agile, winged humanoids known for their speed and grace.
traits: Winged: Can fly short distances
Agile: +1 to dodge rolls

species.name: Converted
species.description: Cybernetically-enhanced zombies created by an unknown force.
traits: Undead: Immune to fear and mind-affecting abilities
Cybernetic: Enhanced strength and durability

species.name: Hakshan
species.description: Mysterious, suited aliens searching for something vitally important to their species.
traits: Advanced Technology: Use highly sophisticated equipment
Enigmatic: Motives are unclear to other species

species.name: Manipulators
species.description: A secretive species known for their political and economic influence.
traits: Master Manipulators: Skilled in diplomacy and deception
Shadow Network: Have spies and agents throughout the galaxy
